title: AI Summit 2026 LIVE Updates: Over 700 sessions planned on AI safety, governance, ethics, data protection over 5 days
snippet: Delhi AI Summit 2026 LIVE: Today is Day 2 of the five-day event scheduled till 20 February. With 13 country pavilions the event will see participation of Heads of states and governments, Ministers, foreign delegates, and international organisation representatives.

title: Will AI eat into your jobs? The sharp divide between layoffs and evolution at India AI impact Summit
snippet: Several experts argue that AI could drive significant benefits, such as boosting productivity. However, they also stress that society must quickly adapt to these changes.

title: Elon Musk and Tim Cook warn of growing memory chip shortage amid AI boom. Who will bear the brunt?
snippet: Tech leaders such as Elon Musk and Tim Cook warn that a deepening global memory chip shortage, driven by AI data centre demand, is sending DRAM prices soaring, squeezing profits and forcing electronics makers to delay launches or raise prices.

title: AI Summit 2026: Vinod Khosla warns of job market shake-up, says IT and BPO roles will vanish in 5 years
snippet: Vinod Khosla predicts that IT services and BPOs may vanish in five years due to AI advancements. He emphasises AI's potential to disrupt expertise-driven jobs and urges India to pivot towards AI-native products.&nbsp;

title: Is AI a threat to your job? Info Edge founder Sanjeev Bikhchandani answers, shares an advice for young professionals
snippet: Sanjeev Bikhchandani of Info Edge reassured that AI will enhance productivity rather than replace jobs. He encouraged young professionals to adopt AI tools to remain competitive, emphasizing that AI can serve previously unviable market segments without displacing employees.

title: '50% of the jobs are going to go away but…': Former HCL CEO issues stark warning at AI Impact Summit
snippet: Vineet Nayar has predicted that AI will eliminate 50% of jobs but also create an equal number of jobs. At the AI Impact Summit, he emphasized India's shift from technology follower to leader.

title: India AI Impact Summit 2026: Over 600 startups to 2.5 lakh visitors — Mega AI event beats government expectations
snippet: India AI Impact Summit 2026: Over 600 startups to 2.5 lakh visitors are set to attend the mega AI event between 16 to 20 February 2026. Here's what Meity Secretary S Krishnan said about the event beating government expectations.&nbsp;

snippet: Calista Redmond, VP Sovereign AI at Nvidia says that nations are increasingly looking at their overarching AI story and not just one component.

title: SpaceX to compete in Pentagon contest for autonomous drone tech: Report
snippet: Texas-based SpaceX recently acquired xAI in ​a deal that combined Musk's major space and defense contractor with the ​billionaire entrepreneur's artificial intelligence startup. It occurred ahead of SpaceX's planned initial public offering this year.

title: India's tougher AI social media rules spark censorship fears
snippet: India has tightened rules governing the use of artificial intelligence on social media to combat a flood of disinformation, but also prompting warnings of censorship and an erosion of digital freedoms. With more than a billion internet users, India is grappling with AI-generated disinformation swamp

title: India AI Summit may issue declaration for democratised AI
snippet: The multilateral agreement is expected to call for greater democratisation of AI resources and a standardised framework for its deployment across sectors, they said. Establishing a formal global creative commons regime for AI will also feature in the joint statement.

title: India is becoming ElevenLabs’ key growth engine as enterprises scale voice AI: CEO Mati Staniszewski
snippet: India is already the second-largest market for ElevenLabs and is fast turning into one of its biggest growth engines, as enterprises scale voice artificial intelligence across customer service, sales and operations, the company’s cofounder and chief executive Mati Staniszewski said.
